input_email_body:
Subject: Concern About Monthly Subscription Charges

Dear Support, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to bring to your attention an issue with my subscription charges My name is Liu Wei.. I was charged twice for the same month, and I believe this might be due to a system glitch. I have already contacted support, and a resolution has been provided. However, I would greatly appreciate it if you could look into this matter and possibly process a refund for the excess charge soon, if possible. Please let me know if you need any additional information to resolve the issue You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. My email address for further contact is necessary. Thank you for your prompt attention.
